name: PAUSED (Hamdy Elzanqali)
description:
What do ducks have to do with rabbits? Exactly, adventure and physics stuff is what you are looking for. If you don't mind, please pause a minute and enjoy an easy set of puzzles and a relaxing game with (I think) beautiful pixel art environment.

Controls MoveA, D, Left Arrow, and Right ArrowJumpW, Z,  B, or Up Arrow
FallS or Down ArrowSwitchX, N, Space, or EnterReloadRPauseEscape or P

You can always buy me a cup of coffee!
Thank You <3
